category_description: Functional art, hand-blown by skilled glassworkers. Each piece is unique, beautiful, and made to last.
category_vibe: These aren't mass-produced. Every swirl, every color shift, every slight variation — that's the human hand at work. This is glass with soul.

products.name: Spiral Galaxy Pipe
products.description: A hand-blown glass piece featuring a mesmerizing purple-to-blue spiral that looks like a galaxy caught in glass. Made by a glassblower in Colorado who's been perfecting their craft for 15 years. The spiral isn't just for show — it cools the smoke as it travels. Comes with a cleaning brush and protective pouch.
products.tone_hint: This is functional art. Talk about the craftsmanship, the way the colors shift in different light, the satisfaction of owning something truly one-of-a-kind.
products.care: Clean with isopropyl alcohol and salt. Avoid extreme temperature changes.

products.name: Sunset Mesa Bubbler
products.description: A compact water bubbler with burnt orange and gold swirls that catch the light like desert sunsets. The chamber is shaped like a mesa, and the whole thing fits comfortably in your palm. Handmade in New Mexico, each one is slightly different. This one's got a personality.
products.tone_hint: Describe it like holding a sunset in your hand. It's portable art that performs beautifully.
products.care: Change water regularly, clean with specialized glass cleaner or alcohol solution.

products.name: Celestial Chillum
products.description: Simple, elegant, timeless. A straight chillum with tiny stars embedded in clear glass, made by a family workshop in India that's been crafting these for generations. This is old-school cool, perfect for anyone who appreciates minimalist function and cultural tradition.
products.tone_hint: This is a classic piece with roots in tradition. Talk about its simplicity, its history, its no-nonsense functionality.
products.care: Soak in alcohol, use pipe cleaners to remove residue.

products.name: Forest Spirit Bong
products.description: A larger water bong with green and amber glass that looks like light filtering through a forest canopy. Three-inch base for stability, ice catch for extra cooling, and a removable downstem for easy cleaning. Made by a collective of glassblowers in Oregon who donate part of their proceeds to reforestation efforts.
products.tone_hint: This is a statement piece — beautiful, functional, and connected to a bigger purpose. Emphasize the quality and the environmental giving.
products.care: Regular cleaning recommended. Use isopropyl alcohol and coarse salt.

products.name: Moonstone One-Hitter
products.description: A tiny glass one-hitter with milky white glass that shimmers like moonstone. Fits in a dugout or your pocket. Made by a micro-studio in California, each piece is hand-painted with a tiny crescent moon. Discreet, elegant, and perfect for microdosing or solo adventures.
products.tone_hint: Small but mighty. Talk about discretion, elegance, and the beauty of simplicity.
products.care: Soak and clean regularly to prevent clogging.

products.name: Rainbow Prism Spoon
products.description: A classic spoon pipe with dichroic glass that shifts through every color of the rainbow depending on how the light hits it. It's like holding a prism. Made in Vermont by an artist who only works with the highest quality borosilicate glass. This piece is durable, functional, and mesmerizing.
products.tone_hint: This is pure visual magic. Emphasize how the colors shift and change, how it's functional art you'll never get tired of looking at.
products.care: Clean regularly with alcohol and salt to maintain color brilliance.
